citations.desc: Consignments to carriers and intermediate handlers.
citations.narrative:
The certification for a parakeet awaiting transport on Air Waybill 006-87661641 was missing most of the information
required under the regulations. The certification did not include the email address of the consignor, the number of birds,
species or common names of the birds, the time and date the bird was last fed and watered and the specific instructions
for the next feeding(s) and watering(s) for a 24-hour period, and the consignor's signature and the date and time the
certification was signed. In addition, the certification must be securely attached to the outside of the primary enclosure in a
manner that makes it easy to notice and read.
The information required in the certification helps ensure the health and well-being of the bird during transport. The carrier
must ensure that all information required under the regulations is included in the consignor's certification.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the cargo facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.161(c) 
   
Consignments to carriers and intermediate handlers. 
The certification for a parakeet awaiting transport on Air Waybill 006-87661641 was missing most of the information 
required under the regulations. The certification did not include the email address of the consignor, the number of birds, 
species or common names of the birds, the time and date the bird was last fed and watered and the specific instructions 
for the next feeding(s) and watering(s) for a 24-hour period, and the consignor's signature and the date and time the 
certification was signed. In addition, the certification must be securely attached to the outside of the primary enclosure in a 
manner that makes it easy to notice and read. 
 
The information required in the certification helps ensure the health and well-being of the bird during transport. The carrier 
must ensure that all information required under the regulations is included in the consignor's certification. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the cargo facility representative. 
 
 n
